column4: my "mini., max., and close" buttons are not in the top right hand corner, they are about an inch from it, is it maybe a theme i have loaded, and reloading it may fix it, or does someone else have an idea of what it is?
well if you were using emerald (with beryl) then we could modify that easily.  not sure how to do that for metacity.
is it only that one theme that does that?
my backspace/space are not repeating when held down, my menu icons are missing, not able to adjust my themes, meatcity is installed
and the above stated issue, my min./max./close are in a strange spot
i'd purge the ubuntu-desktop and then re-install it.  backup your data first though.
use aptitude though, instead of apt-get.
i'm here.  yeah, i'd shut down X before I did all that.
so just do it in a ttyl?
